section.p: The path to the default stylesheet is: sernaInstallationPath/plugins/syntext/default/default.xsl.
The default stylesheet is a general-purpose stylesheet that allows you to edit an arbitrary XML document. To use this stylesheet, open or create documents with the Default Template.

fig.title: Document opened with the Default stylesheet.

note.p: It is recommended to use this stylesheet in the Markup mode , because it isn't optimized for full WYSIWYG.
